channel.title: Brass Instrument Valve Fingering Patch Simple
channel.description: i woke up this morning with this idea. i guess millions of people have already done it on other plattforms and much better since i am not a programmer. but however it does not look there is a better axo patch yet for me as a tuba player :-) someone else might find it usefull. trumpet.axp (17.5 KB)

hahaaa... cool... i have one in the cupboard. dont practise any more. which is needed on a trombone

@dingolishious wrote:

I own a trombone. I can make it sound okay, but haven't really gotten around to playing it. Last time I had it out I was doing an airplane sound for live foley sound effect.
